005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundChoiceGroup;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundGroupedAssembly;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IConstraintBase;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.IValueConstraintsBase;
018
019import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
020import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
021
022import java.util.LinkedList;
023import java.util.List;
024
025@SuppressWarnings({
026    "PMD.DataClass",
027    "PMD.ExcessivePublicCount",
028    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
029})
030@MetaschemaAssembly(
031    name = "flag-constraints",
032    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
033public class FlagConstraints implements IValueConstraintsBase {
034  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
035
036  @BoundAssembly(
037      formalName = "Constraint Let Expression",
038      useName = "let",
039      maxOccurs = -1,
040      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "lets", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
041  private List<ConstraintLetExpression> _lets;
042
043  @BoundChoiceGroup(
044      minOccurs = 1,
045      maxOccurs = -1,
046      assemblies = {
047          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Allowed Values Constraint", useName = "allowed-values",
048              binding = FlagAllowedValues.class),
049          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Expect Condition Constraint", useName = "expect",
050              binding = FlagExpect.class),
051          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Index Has Key Constraint", useName = "index-has-key",
052              binding = FlagIndexHasKey.class),
053          @BoundGroupedAssembly(formalName = "Value Matches Constraint", useName = "matches",
054              binding = FlagMatches.class)
055      },
056      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "rules", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
057  private List<? extends IConstraintBase> _rules;
058
059  public FlagConstraints() {
060    this(null);
061  }
062
063  public FlagConstraints(IMetaschemaData data) {
064    this.__metaschemaData = data;
065  }
066
067  @Override
068  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
069    return __metaschemaData;
070  }
071
072  @Override
073  public List<ConstraintLetExpression> getLets() {
074    return _lets;
075  }
076
077  public void setLets(List<ConstraintLetExpression> value) {
078    _lets = value;
079  }
080
081  /**
082   * Add a new {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item to the underlying collection.
083   *
084   * @param item
085   *          the item to add
086   * @return {@code true}
087   */
088  public boolean addLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
089    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
090    if (_lets == null) {
091      _lets = new LinkedList<>();
092    }
093    return _lets.add(value);
094  }
095
096  /**
097   * Remove the first matching {@link ConstraintLetExpression} item from the
098   * underlying collection.
099   *
100   * @param item
101   *          the item to remove
102   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
103   */
104  public boolean removeLet(ConstraintLetExpression item) {
105    ConstraintLetExpression value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
106    return _lets != null && _lets.remove(value);
107  }
108
109  @Override
110  public List<? extends IConstraintBase> getRules() {
111    return _rules;
112  }
113
114  public void setRules(List<? extends IConstraintBase> value) {
115    _rules = value;
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public String toString() {
120    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
121  }
122}
